```{r}
install.packages("readxl")
library(readxl)

data <- read_excel('mtb_stats.xlsx', 'Sheet2')

data


labels <- data['label']
```


Average bikes by flip-chip setting
```{r}

no_setting_idx <- is.na(data['setting'])

no_setting <- data[no_setting_idx, ]
setting <- data[!no_setting_idx, ]

mean_by_setting <- aggregate(setting[,-3], list( setting$model), FUN=mean) 
mean_by_setting$model <- mean_by_setting$Group.1
mean_by_setting <- mean_by_setting[,-1]

no_setting <- no_setting[,-3]

new_data <- rbind(mean_by_setting, no_setting)
```
